Texts.Chs: 我今天登上了另一个停靠在码头的飞艇村。在别人抱怨之前，我爬上了船锚，把自己藏进了船舱。一切都很顺利，船长是一个叫维尔诺兹的快乐小伙子，他允许我教他弹尤克里里。游戏进行到一半的时候发生了这样的事情。当时我赢了。
Texts.Eng: I boarded another airship village today, when it had stopped to dock. Climbed my way up the anchor and squirreled myself into a cabin before anyone could complain. Everything was going well; the captain, a jolly fellow called Wrenolds, allowed me to teach him how to play Lilyflip. We were half way through a game when it happened. I was winning.

Texts.Chs: 我不知道翼族人已经研制出了可以让他们再次飞行的装甲。我把这件事告诉了维尔诺兹，他告诉我这是闻所未闻的。他喃喃地说了些关于能量水晶的事情，然后我听到他提到了我亲爱的朋友绿手指，他们显然是要去见他。真幸运！我告诉他可以让我在那里下船。
Texts.Eng: I was unaware the Avians had developed armour that allowed them to fly again. I commented on this to Wrenolds, and he told me it was unheard of. He muttered something about power crystals, and then I heard him mention my dear friend Greenfinger, who they were apparently going to see. What luck! I informed him he could drop me off there.

Texts.Chs: 子弹简单地从铁鸟人身上弹开上，鸟人大笑起来，打碎了船上的桅杆，然后一跃而起。他胸口上一个发光的圆圈开始跳动，然后那鸟人脚上的推进器启动了，鸟人起飞了，像火箭飞船一样冲向天空。多么壮观的景象！
Texts.Eng: The bullets simply bounced off the iron Avian, who laughed, smashed the ship's mast, then leaped into the air. A glowing circle on his chest began to pulsate, then thrusters in the man's feet kicked in, and the Avian took off, soaring into the skies like a rocket ship. What a sight!

Texts.Chs: 货舱的门裂开了，一只巨大的金属鸟大步走了出来。他迅速派遣了船上的一些船员，拳打脚踢。我在恐惧中畏缩着，躲在船长的身后，船长的步枪开了几枪。
Texts.Eng: The door to the cargo hold splintered open, and a large, metallic Avian came striding out. Swiftly he dispatched a number of the ship's crew, punching and smashing his way around. I cowered in fear, hiding behind the captain, who let off some shots from his rifle.
